messages.subject: File - Trim Posts & Change the Subject!
messages.msgSnippet: As a kindness to others please strip any extraneous text from the top or bottom of your posts so those on digest don t have to scroll through entire quoted
messages.messageBody:
As a kindness to others please strip any extraneous text from the top or bottom of your posts so those on digest don't have to scroll through entire quoted digests or repeated copies of the footer.

And if you change the topic, please change the subject for those who would like to skip some threads.

UnschoolingDiscussion Moderators
